Message:
From then on, I traveled
from nation to nation.

If I came across
someone sick or injured,
I would soothe their pain
with magic.

There were those who feared
me because of my magic,

but once I had healed them,
they all thanked me...

I showed them that magic
wasn’t something just to harm—
like medicinal herbs,
it could be used as
a poison or a salve.

By using my power as a witch
for good, perhaps someday,
even the Witch Hunt
may come to an end...

Then, the hearts of both
people afraid of witches,
and witches afraid of the Church,
can be healed.

That was what
I believed back then.

I thought that...as long as
I wished to heal the injured,
things would turn out alright.
But, the world wasn’t so simple.
